column1: # The reading for December 1938 is adjusted for snow and has been retained.
# The reading for January 1940 is adjusted for snow and has been retained.
# The reading for June 1944 is part-estimated and has been retained.
# The reading for January 1945 is part-estimated and has been retained.
# The gauge moved to Willow Tree Farm at the end of March 1945.
# Combining information on the 1950s sheet, in British Rainfall and in MIDAS indicates that the gauge moved back to Bingham Lodge in July 1955.
# The station continued until 2006 according to MIDAS.
